src:
Un peón de 26 años murió al chocar con un auto en la ruta 34
La víctima circulaba a bordo de su moto y se dirigía hacia su trabajo. En el rodado mayor viajaban cuatro personas, entre ellas dos niños que resultaron con heridas.
01 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Un peón rural falleció esta mañana luego de protagonizar un violento accidente contra un auto, sobre la ruta 34, a la altura de Garza, departamento Sarmiento.
Por causas que se investigan, una motocicleta que era guiada por Ariel Toloza (26) colisionó con un auto en el que viajaban cuatro personas.



Como consecuencia del violento impacto, el joven motociclista perdió la vida en el acto, mientras que dos menores de edad que iban en el auto, tuvieron que ser trasladados al Cepsi y los dos restantes, al Regional.
Por jurisdicción, trabajó en el lugar personal de la Comisaría 38º.
text:
A 26-year-old pawn died when he hit a car on Route 34
The victim was riding on his motorcycle and headed for work. In the main road four people were traveling, including two children who were injured.
01 Nov 2019 by Policiales
A rural pawn died this morning after starring in a violent accident against a car, on Route 34, at the height of Garza, Sarmiento department.
For reasons under investigation, a motorcycle that was guided by Ariel Toloza (26) collided with a car in which four people were traveling.



As a result of the violent impact, the young motorcyclist lost his life in the act, while two minors who were in the car had to be transferred to Cepsi and the remaining two, to the Regional.
By jurisdiction, he worked in the personal place of the 38th Police Station.
